title: 1. {'action': 'fill', 'target': "input[name='jobDescription']", 'value': 'JavaScript developer with AWS experience'}
expected_result: ** Job description is filled and AI is suggesting questions

title: 1. {'action': 'fill', 'target': "input[name='jobTitle']", 'value': '2-year experienced JavaScript developer'}
expected_result: ** AI generates a complete job description

title: 1. {'action': 'click', 'target': "button[aria-label='Enhanced JD Feature']"}
expected_result: ** AI prefills and edits the job description

title: 2. {'action': 'check', 'target': "input[name='awsExperience']"}
expected_result: ** AI extracts key skills from job description and user can pick from suggested skills

title: 1. {'action': 'selectOption', 'target': "select[name='difficultyLevel']", 'option': 'Moderate'}
expected_result: ** Difficulty level of questions is set

title: 1. {'action': 'fill', 'target': "input[name='companyName']", 'value': 'Test Company'}
expected_result: ** Company name is filled and AI analyzes job description

title: 2. {'action': 'check', 'target': "input[name='standardQuestion2']"}
expected_result: ** Standard questions are populated and can be personalized

title: 2. {'action': 'check', 'target': "input[name='roleBasedQuestion2']"}
expected_result: ** Role-based questions are generated with preferred answers

title: 1. {'action': 'click', 'target': "button[aria-label='Create Interview']"}
expected_result: ** Interview is created with a unique public interview link

title: 1. {'action': 'click', 'target': "link(text='Responses')"}
expected_result: ** Candidate responses are displayed with structured answers, video recordings, scores, and resumes

title: 2. {'action': 'getByText', 'target': 'Summary'}
expected_result: ** The AI analysis summary is displayed with observations, positives, and negatives

title: 1. {'action': 'click', 'target': "button(text='Select' or text='Reject')"}
expected_result: ** The candidate is either selected or rejected

title: 2. {'action': 'uploadFile', 'target': "input[type='file']", 'file': 'resume.pdf'}
expected_result: ** The AI commences the screening process and assigns a resume score

title: 2. {'action': 'getByText', 'target': 'Recommendation'}
expected_result: ** The AI recommendation is displayed with a suitability score

title: 1. {'action': 'click', 'target': "button(text='Send Interview Link')"}
expected_result: ** The interview link is sent to the candidate and is valid for 24 hours
